snippet: The drivers Catello Manzi and Jeff Gregory were hospitalized after being involved in a multihorse accident in the fourth race at Freehold Raceway in New Jersey.
abstract: Jockeys Catello Manzi and Jeff Gregory are hospitalized after being involved in a multihorse accident in harness race at Freehold Raceway in New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: The drivers Catello Manzi and Jeff Gregory were hospitalized after being involved in a multihorse accident in the fourth race at Freehold Raceway in New Jersey.

headline.main: Crash Sends Two Drivers to Hospital
headline.print_headline: Crash Sends Two Drivers to Hospital
